website_summaries.verdict: Reviewers loved the quality of these RV wheel covers. Their only real complaint was that there were no straps for extra security in case of high winds.
pros: Helps protect wheels from the sun, which can make them crack
Comes in a variety of sizes for a custom fit
Waterproof, wipe-clean vinyl with soft, non-scratch backing
cons: No straps to tie down to the wheel in case of wind, or grommets for adding your own

customer_reviews.title: They were obviously on someone's tires and returned because the white felt on the inside had the dirty outline from someone's tires
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in NEW and was charged for new. They were obviously on someone's tires and returned because the white felt on the inside had the dirty outline from someone's tires. How tacky!
customer_reviews.author: Rolyat

customer_reviews.title: I carefully measured my trailer tires, they were between ...
customer_reviews.text: I carefully measured my trailer tires, they were between 26" and 26.5" wide, and while the covers fit, they are too tight and don't extend all the way down the wheel, leaving about 2" exposed. I'd return them but it's not worth the effort. I'll just replace them in a few years. UPDATED: The company noticed my review and sent me the next size up. They fit perfectly. The lesson here is, it can be hard to measure tires, and if you're at the upper limit of a size's range, get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time. Hold nicely.
customer_reviews.text: These are to replace a set that are several years old and finally began cracking. I've been very impressed with their holding power and longevity so I just had to have the same ones agin.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these wheel covers!
customer_reviews.text: Am giving this 5 stars, but not rating the durability as I've only had them for a few weeks. Waiting to see how long they hold up. I do like the black color more than the grey I had previously. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Correct size was provided as specified. The fabric backing prevents the tires from getting scratched or damaged but does not snag on the rubber. The tight fit ensures they will not blow off in the wind. They are a little tricky to put on because I don't have very much space under the wheel well. But it's really not that hard. It just takes 30 seconds to jiggle them into place and get them straightened out. They don't reach all the way to the ground. But since I park my trailer in a lower spot that will help keep water off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the jury is still out on the durability, just put them on , they fit perfectly and arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: inimitable idiot

customer_reviews.title: I did like the covers I received
customer_reviews.text: I did like the covers I received. Seem like they were made good and the fit great! My RV tires are 14 inch and 26 inches in height and fit very well. Beware....if you order these covers, they ship them by Fed-Ex smartpost (usps) and they took 14 days to arrive. Very poor shipping and I would never order again if I see smartpost (usps) shipping. I was told 4 times I would receive them the next day...never happened. Over all, nice tire covers.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Fraser

customer_reviews.title: OK but on the small side
customer_reviews.text: fabrication is ok but these are on the small side given the sizing representation, which makes them difficult to put on, and keep the entire tire covered.
customer_reviews.author: Krakski

customer_reviews.title: Seem durable.
customer_reviews.text: These seem very well made and robust. My camper has 185/80D13 tires and the 21-24” size cover fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vader540

customer_reviews.title: cover
customer_reviews.text: smaller then I thought also read ad wrong thought it meant 4 covers not 2
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Hill

customer_reviews.title: Flew off in first wind storm
customer_reviews.text: First windstorm and now one is gone never to be seen again, had less than a month
customer_reviews.author: Evolrider

customer_reviews.title: but it was easy to measure my tires on the boat trailer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what size to order, but it was easy to measure my tires on the boat trailer and match them with the right size covers. They are exactly what I needed to keep my tires from rotting in the AZ sun while the boat is in storage. I was replacing tires every summer when we would trailer the boat to the lake. Since I have put these on we haven't had one blow out. The fit and construction are great. Need to buy 2 more sets for my toy hauler to keep the tire from rotting. Will recommend buying these for your trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Chad E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers with no way to fasten them on.
customer_reviews.text: Nice covers with no way to hold them in place or tie them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: these 26. 5 " covers are a little too ...
customer_reviews.text: these 26.5 " covers are a little too tight for 15" tires,, if you have 15" tires order the covers for 29" diameter tires,, I have 2" of exposed tire at the bottom on my 15" 26.5" diameter tires,, looks good
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Good product for RV or trucks
customer_reviews.text: Use them on my truck and they work great. Don't fly off. Offer sun protection. But you have to remember to take them off!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorcas Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I got the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: They're too small I should have measured mine doesn't fit right
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Nice tight fit. We had the same brand on our last trailer, so when upgrade it it was a no-brainer to get these too.
customer_reviews.author: Jadd

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Covers the camper tires without an issue. Protects from sunlight
customer_reviews.author: Shawn J

customer_reviews.title: They fit too tight on my tires which were shown ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit too tight on my tires which were shown would fit and there isn't any sort of "Tie" to assure they stay on in a wind, I've lost one in our Wyoming wind alredy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!! Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first winter with covers on my new wheels and let me tell you I am glad I bought them. We had a real severe winter here in the northeast and these covers saved my pbrand new wheels I bought. They reduced pitting on the chrome and paint wear.
customer_reviews.author: P. Trip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boat trailer.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to cover the tires on my boat trailer to keep the sun off of them. These work great. They fit well and look nice. They are thick and durable. These are much better than the previous set of covers that I had.
customer_reviews.author: brc1981

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good quality, should last at least a couple of seasons...we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be high quality construction and a perfect for our camper.
customer_reviews.author: LynnW.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Seem sturdy and washable. So far very happy about these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lynn

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: very nice covers for my Keystone passport 14bh fit well and easy on/off year and a half and still like new. don't blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Scot

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wheel covers. I tied down bottom corners with tarp clips and bungee cords to prevent them from blowing off during windstorms.
customer_reviews.author: TLP Texas

customer_reviews.title: White inside liner comes off on tires
customer_reviews.text: Product worked good for about 4 months. Now remnants of the white inside liner come off on My tires. I cannot recommend this product. I'll send them back if You like.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Covers, heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and are very thick. We will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: Too snug for my tires. Not sure why. ...
customer_reviews.text: Too snug for my tires. Not sure why. And they do not reach the ground. Wish I got larger ones and bungees them.
customer_reviews.author: Ptfield

customer_reviews.title: Works well, quality seems fine
customer_reviews.text: The covers fit perfectly and the quality seems good. Given other reviews, there probably should be some way to secure the bottom of the cover behind the tire, but we haven't had a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: Dont fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I measured our tire and ordered what size it said but they don't go to the ground. About 1/4 of the bottom of the tire is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Zero regrets
customer_reviews.text: They fit a 205/75/r14 trailer tire perfectly ! Have had great luck with covers from grils to air conditioners with Classic Accessories , so if history proves true , this is a great product !
customer_reviews.author: Empirical

customer_reviews.title: Work GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Hey gotta cover those tires!! No way around it. These fit snug, don't ever blow off. I'm a girl putting them on with no worries👍🏻 They also function to keep wheels clean. I like.
customer_reviews.author: deerpath

customer_reviews.title: These are a pair of nice fitting tire covers
customer_reviews.text: These are a pair of nice fitting tire covers. Our camper only has 14" tires so we thought they would not fit very well but they are good and snug and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they blow off in heavy wind storms. The eleastic ...
customer_reviews.text: they blow off in heavy wind storms. The eleastic keeps them on as long as there isnt heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: RV Wheel covefrs
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly and fit exactly as advertised so I am well pleased so far. Time will tell on the durability but they seem well made and were considerably less expensive than buying them at your typical RV supplies mass merchandising store.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice snug fit, easy to attach to the tires (without having to physically get on the ground to do it), the quality appears to be very good. I'll report back after the winter & spring to give it some time in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps our tires covered while the trailer is parked. This saves the tires from the hot New Mexico sun drying them out. The covers fit our tires perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JanetAlexanderJewelry

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, fast delivery, good price. A bit hard to put on the first time, but they're supposed to be a snug fit, so to be understood.
customer_reviews.author: dotcompost

customer_reviews.title: Tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Love these, you save $ compared to other stores. This is a great price and fits perfect when you order the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel covers
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who wants to extend the life of their RV tires ought to keep the sun from shining on them during storage or "down time," by covering them with the Classic Accessories RV Wheel Covers. The covers appear to be strong and efficient for their work of protecting the tires one assigns to them.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Barron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price but a bit small for size they listed
customer_reviews.author: Ron Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for boat trailer tires
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for boat trailer tires! Arrived fast from seller & have held up very good outside so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly over my ST205/75R14 tires. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shantzonpoint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looks easy peasy to put on, they look to be durable. Time will tell Great price...
customer_reviews.author: geo...

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems to be better than other wheel covers I have had in the past and the fit is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use... works perfectly at the turn of a dial. No brainer here
customer_reviews.author: Supersport1

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE!! Really top-quality product.
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A DEAL!! These were much thicker & better built (fabric lined, well-stitched) than I expected. Glad I got two pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they fit my boat trailer tires perfectly. They are snug to get on the first time since they're new but do stretch out after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will be amazed at how nice these are!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the nice quality of these tire covers! They have a nice heavy weight to them and are easy to put on. Such a great price for this quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Flawless shipping/receiving. Just what I needed to protect the wheels. I think they will last as they seem quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay58

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a fair price.Perfect fit. Would buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: skibud85

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit but I think they wont last too long. The vinyl feels a little bit thin
customer_reviews.author: Stpnstn

customer_reviews.title: these look to be good quality, and fit snugly enough that I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit the 13 inch tires on my pop-up perfectly, I store it in the sun and needed some protection for the tires, these look to be good quality, and fit snugly enough that I don't need bungees.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PROTECTION FOR TIRES
customer_reviews.text: Work great in the Colorado climate and since these are vinyl coated they clean up easily and don't get mildew or mold.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Bean

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: The wheel covers arrived in perfect condition and on time. They fit like a glove and I like the gray color...less noticeable. They appear to be very good quality. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with a decent price. Fit very well on my Kodiak Travel trailer
customer_reviews.author: vttrav

customer_reviews.title: Sized small
customer_reviews.text: Covers seem to be sized on the small side. Ordered the correct measured size but they're too short to cover the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: L A M

customer_reviews.title: RV Tire Covers
customer_reviews.text: Good quality covers that fit tight so they won't blow off in the wind. Quick delivery of new product in box.
customer_reviews.author: A. McPeak

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit
customer_reviews.text: Even though I took the measurements as directed, they do not fit. They is no way. They are at least 4 inches too short. They don't cover the entire tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: Bought the wrong size and got them dirty trying to fit them on my RV they were OK My mistake
customer_reviews.author: James W. Sale

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them on my 26" tires but was very tight
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on. Fit the tire well. Satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and are easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like your product. Well made and they fit nice, but I ordered white and I was sent black.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: They recieved them next day loved that. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my parents. They recieved them next day loved that. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Lyncha

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Thick material and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Thick material and very well made! Definitely recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Dennise Adams

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ones that are advertised as fitting 24-26 1/2" wheels, so imagine my surprise when they were too small for my 25" wheels! The bottom 2" of the wheels are completely exposed, making these "partial wheel covers." Returning them now to try a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: TomR

customer_reviews.title: tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Same product as JCWhitney but cheaper...very good...I have prior sets which are over 10 years old...
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Howser

customer_reviews.title: Must have for RV tires
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be of good quality. The 24-26.5" size just fit my 26" tires. Grey color much better than usual white. They block the UV light. Happy RV camper.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Wheel covers for 4 RV tires
customer_reviews.text: Work just fine, go on easy, look nice--what more can I say. Buy some today. That's abut it. Have a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my application, easy to install and remove. Covers the wheel completely providing you order the correct size for your RV tire.
customer_reviews.author: pem

customer_reviews.title: Look great on camper
customer_reviews.text: Measured tires before ordering to make sure they fit. Look great on camper. Hoping they last through the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my boat trailer for storage in the AZ sun. No complaints so far. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Enlow

customer_reviews.title: Not happy and they are dirty now so probably not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Thought I measured the diameter of my tires these are too snug and do not completely cover the tire. Not happy and they are dirty now so probably not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: They didn't fit very well for the size of the tire on my trailer..I measured the tires and send it in as per what the ad said. Just to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Perry

customer_reviews.title: slow to ship
customer_reviews.text: The item is good. The vender took a while before they even shipped the product. This a good quality product. The vendor that supplied the product did not ship for days until after I had ordered and paid for the product.
customer_reviews.author: waiting

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories 76230 RV & Trailer Wheel Covers 21"-24" Diameter, 8.25" Wide, White, Set of Two
product_meta.description: Size:21"-24" Diameter, 8.25" Wide| Color:WhiteThe OverDrive Standard RV & trailer wheel covers by Classic Accessories provides sturdy tire protection, guarding tires and wheels against sun damage, dirt and rust when your RV is parked. When you buy a Classic Accessories RV cover you are not just getting a cover; you’re also purchasing peace of mind. Not only will you be protected from the elements, but you’ll be protected with the easiest warranty in the industry. If your product fails within the warranty period, look for us online and take advantage of our Hassle-Free warranty program supported by our US-based customer service team.
feature_bullets: Fits RVs & trailers with 21" - 24" diameter tires, up to 8.25" wide
Fast and easy slip-on fit with elasticized back panel
Wipe clean vinyl material with soft non-scratch backing with three year warranty

specifications.Cover Included: Classic Accessories 21"-24", 8.25" Wide RV Wheel Cover, White
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars323 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
